ygData.subject: Re: Saving Private Sereph + Guk stuff(all must read the  Guk part!!!)
ygData.msgSnippet: Oh yeah, please inform me in advance if you can t make it during the period the raid is on. Also, if you want to get your kaki into this activity, please tell
ygData.messageBody:
Oh yeah, please inform me in advance if you can't make it during the
period the raid is on. Also, if you want to get your kaki into this
activity, please tell me by sunday. I need their name, class and levels.

Sereph, Mastermind behind the top ten dangerous and unsolved crimes in
S'pore and part time Pai Kia Tau.

Sereph wrote:

> Okay, about credit cards. I will not be entering your credit card
> number. If you are willing to help, I'll send you my The Station user
> name and password.
>
> All you have to do is to edit my account info, by filling in the
> credit card number and your house address.
>
> The info will be sent to Sony and no matter what i do, I can't check
> the number oif the credit card. If you don't believe, try to edit your
> own account. It won't show you the number.
>
> And now on Guk.
>
> I have a rough plan up now *search around and pull out an A0 size
> paper covered with tiny words*
>
> Let's see.... First off, I need to know the agility(modified and
> unmodified) of the following tanks. This is to determind who be
> primary tank and who be the secondary one
>
> Garren
> Yiyang
> Aaleku
> Yutaka
> Kenven/Kellindel
> Sunblade
>
> Next, int value of these nukers, so that I can plan what time you guys
> should nuke (remember guk has a high spawn rate. Nuking on site is too
> mana ineffective)
>
> Ziltus
> Leshrec
> Nicademous
> Zanderion
> Kalandra
>
> Wis base casters don't need to report. See your face knows how much
> mana you have already.
>
> Each group there, will have to assign someone to be the "kamikaze
> piolet"
>
> Function of this guy? If a big train is started, this guy will be
> responsible of taunting the WHOLE train, and die, while the rest
> gate/run out.
>
> For the 20+ group, I'll volunteer for this since I get a incredible
> 50% exp bonus while in a full group and my area effect DOT songs can
> taunt like no tomorrow. For the other 2, decide who gets to die among
> yourself.
>
> Now on supplies. The 2 magician and 3(2 if Neriss go MIA) wis base
> casters will be required to provide enought supplies to last the whole
> gang. Nicademous, Kenven and Kellendil can help them out by going into
> Grobb and I and Sunblade can forage a bit to help out.
>
> Spell casters, please remember to get 100 each of your spell
> components. 200+ for pet reagents to be KS.
>
> No alpha loot will be in place. Instead, auto split will be turn on,
> and 1 person of each group will be delicated to looting everything.
> Please report whatever you get to all 3 groups. We will decide by vote
> who requires the item the most and hand it to him/her first.
>
> This event will be a 2 day, 3 night event. We will make our way to guk
> on Saturday night and fight from Saturday night to National day. When
> TV showing fire works, those present will atempt to choing the frogloc
> paladin if we gather enough force, and no one is camping the goon.
>
> For this act, I have to do some calculation during that time to see if
> we can take it on.
>
> If this works out, next spot will be Cazic Thule or Najera. Will take
> out the whole plan after I get my ideas together.
>
> Synzzz wrote:
>
>> Seraph, I can understand how it feels to put all your effort into EQ
>> and now face the prospect of losing it all.And since i think you're
>> a nice guy/gal (heh) who helps ppl out and all that...i'm willing to
>> help you here. However, i do first want to know how i can help you
>> with my credit card. You have to enter the number right?After all,
>> much as i think you're a nice guy, money is still money and credit
>> card numbers are dangerousto pass around =) I'm sure everyone can
>> understand that. I delete all msgs upon reading and so forgot to
>> keep that email add of yours... so here's mine
>> hannibal@... Email me and we'll discuss this further.
>> Synzzz aka Zanderion
>
